content.text:
[@Handy Hedgie](@e7p1QmsZwVOefPSARnYsZtpoewRHqznugjpKRqIuH44=.ed25519) 

I've only watched it once, so I think (?!) I've only found one ending, but the timeline jumped around a little bit and I think I lost track. I saw it after [@ailrick](@3oy7lS05WQRV4yzaQVy92LAO9KLqFCnEHzzUDfAWN3c=.ed25519) mentioned it [here](%qPAZZkhgKUzlNDAEDicBvJ9Hb3IbIzH+d7reo03TQ2k=.sha256) and really enjoyed it. I mostly just enjoyed the story, I felt like the [???](%p0mwlKS6MxSs5lsJbx5aAEJmWUkQ4SydP94jw/vCzgE=.sha256) was a bit shallow between the two options at each scene.
